EmailTemplate.name: Application Resume Later Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Saved! Finish your application with Parker Lane
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Quote.Applicant_1_Full_Name__c},
Application saved!
Most people who save at this page complete their application within the next 3 days. Details of the loan application is as follows:
Loan Type: {!Quote.Product_Type__c} Amount: {!Quote.Customer_Amount__c} Term: {!Quote.Loan_Term__c} months Interest rate: {!Quote.Interest_Rate__c}% p.a. Comparison Rate: {!Quote.Actual_Comparison_Rate__c} p.a.* Estimated monthly payment: {!Quote.Monthly_Repayment__c}
To finish what you’ve started simply sign in via the link below.
Resume my application
Prefer to speak to a human? Our expert Advisers are here to help you find the loan that’s right for you. Book a call back time or call 1300 13 17 11 today.
Kind regards, The Parker Lane team
